title: Grateful Dead Live at San Francisco Civic Auditorium on 1987-01-29
lineage: MAC playback on Nakamichi DR-2 > Presonus Firebox/Neutrik Input > firewire > XP Pro PC/Wavelab 5 (recorded as 24bit/96 KHz WAV) > Waves L3, rendered to 16/44.1 using Waves IDR hi res CD dither settings > CDWAV 1.9 > FLAC (level 8 encoding). Digital transfer, rendering and FLAC encoding by C.Ladner. - matrix mixing by Kevin Tobin
source: flac16; Matrix 2 Source Mix - SBD (shnid = 83284)Recording Info: SBD -> Cassette Master (Maxell MX90/Sony D5) Transfer Info: Cassette Master (Tascam 122mkII) -> Apogee MiniMe (24bit/48k) -> Samplitude Professional v8.01 -> FLAC/16 All Transfers and Mastering By Charlie Miller + AUD (shnid = 79467) Source: Nakamichi 100s, taper's section > Sony D5 > Maxell MX90s. Recorded by B.Koucky.
